alert.note: Alert for Inland Flagler (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 2:22PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Flagler County through 245 PM EDT... At 222 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Daytona Beach, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Flagler County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
